document.full_text: financial markets piled pressure on heavily indebted euro zone countries on monday as investors worried about heightened risks in spain and greece and ratings agencies stoked new concerns over italy and belgium.
document.title: euro zone debtors under pressure over new risks
lines_and_colors: financial markets piled pressure on heavily indebted euro zone countries on monday as investors worried about heightened risks in spain and greece and ratings agencies stoked new concerns over italy and belgium.
